values:
yeeeahh.. i got a new one. 
'heartXcre'

ew.

closing down my livejournal because i have nothing to say to any of you anymore.
weve ruined eachother, ourselves and what we had to begin with.
and you know what fucker, if you didnt even have enough respect to tell me about it, your not worth these fucking tears. fuck you all.
i dont want to have anything to do with any of you anymore.
as of now im telling my mum to get us the fuck out of port moody.

so, yesterday i get ready, take a shower, go to monikas. hang out with moni ali maria abe naanie jan colin tyler jesse megan and taran and anna for a bit.
(yay for putting a face to an email address.) i was in a really weird mood. just, it was weird. i dont know how to act around most of those people, especially megan and maria and moni. i dont know, i guess im just insecure. i blazed a little and that was.. gross. i hate smoking pot. its rather discusting. i hate smokeing cigarettes, they are even more discusting. so anyways. i felt like an outcast, colin and my eyes didnt even lock, or anything, he seems not to notice me but.. kay whatever. so i just followed nalanie. and when i came out of alis house (cuz i buzzed in to go to the bathroom or something) i heard everyone talking to colin about me. i just kind of, stood there, felt like crying. "shes fuckin 13." "pedafile" then someone yell "SHES RIGHT THERE" "shh." wow.. kayy. i walk up wih a blank lok on my face. colin goes, "taylor do you see me going out with you?" "...no.." ali goes, "but you phoned me telling me you were considering it" colin: " well yeah i was considering it look at taylor, shes a pretty girl." everyone looks at me. im just.. standing there with a blank look on my face as i think " obviously not pretty enough for you"  i stand back from the weed and shit, some people go inside to eat cake, including colin, and i leave. this isnt funny anymore.
just fuckin love me.
and i need to know, everyone who reads this bullshit, do you like me? (im talking friends-wise) or am i just another annoying little 13 yr old. i need to know wether or not hanging out with you guys is worth it. or if im making a fool of myself.
so, everyone: do you like me.

this is so fuckd. my entire body aches. every single bit of it. my EYES even hurt. im feeling asthough i want to huddle up and die, i cry almost everyday now, i cant motivate myself to do anything (even take a shower.) and im starting to think i have something wrong with me.  happy one week horrible the next. i would hate to say i am bi-polar, because i dont know about it completely. all i know is that my uncle has it and being around him i see that i am the same way, for the most part. hmm, i shall research.
im stressed out of my face.
FUCK EVERYTHING HURTS.

today consisted of me and a bunch working in a movie. pretty much the same old. only in two weeks time i will be 120 dollars richer and able to get a bunny. does anyone have any name ideas? heres what i have:
overdose
amour
tokyo
i had a few more ive seemd to forgotten them.
pah. whatever. slept at lanies last night. spent till four in the morning talking about shit; how i fuckd up things with colin. i was crying, slightly on dex was i. it was okay, i guess.
ummmm i have cable now. and a pink hat from my gay uncle and my aunty cody :)
so Oc nights can be held here every once and a while. :P
cereal is good, take alis advice :D:D:D

so today i went to lindsays/alis rugby game and hung out with colin and elena. after the game we went to alis house with a few people and just hung out.. suprisingly i helped with colins grade 11 math and could figure it out. pretty much the same shit were doing. actually, EXCACTLY  the same.
and then taylor felt smart.
but then, i broke my non smoking rule, OH GOD NO. ew. and tomorrow s 4:20 YUS!
but hanging out at alis was fun. colin brought up a point i wish to quote. "whats funny is that people -want- to have problems. strive for perfection rather than impefection." and its true. it brought alot of thoughts to my mind. however im a lazy fuck.
then i got home and my mum started bitching at me about my room. nalanie came to ask if i could come over but i had to clean. so i did, then i asked if i could go cuz she said i could after i cleaned, and the bitch still said no. so taylor threw a spazzum. slammed doors threw shit, swore. im hoping to get kicked out oone of these days. oh, and the fucker thinks im baked. walks in randomly and says she thought she smelt something. bitch can DIE.
DIE BITCH :D

i hope i move.
and i hope people visit me.

so last night im sitting in surrey all dressed up gothic for dinner. and my mum goes, "i want to watch the band. im dropping you off at janelles house." yay. then she drops me off at janelles house at 11 15 without her knowing.. and i spent the night. woke up at 3 30.. and realized i forgotten i was supposed to go to the mall. ew. eh, whatever.
im thinking of going to see my grandma one day soon, i miss her kindness :)
today i told my mum i was asking about group homes. she laughed in my face then got upset because it was 'the worst thing i could say to her' ..this was of course after she told me she cant wait for me to move out. she also told me to overdose. go figure.
i hate posting in this thing..
its so.. ugly.

hokay.
so im hopeing babysitting doesnt go to 6 or im fuckd because i cant get a ride from ali or monika to the hair show. perhaps ill get off at 5:30? hope so.
then after if anyones at alis im gunna go down there and watch the oc because i dont have cable and thats just.. boo.(N)
well im bored. and off to babysitting. my cell is 778-772-4772 if anyone would like to keep me company.
wooo.
got my tarot cards read by moi today, i shall post it all up later.
wooh.
lately ive been sooo happy and its been great.

oh oh, and sunday me and lanie and emolee (who i shall ask) and colin are going to le mall. and perhaps stephy too, cuz were just that hardcre. yuup.
and tomorrow im sleeping at sierras, and thats my week for you.

so taylors home alone till 11 tonight..
anyone wanna do something? perhaps ill walk down to alis.
-.o

+scratches arms+
oh my god so bored.

i like butter i like ham i like toast and i like spam these are things that make me happy something fresh something snappy.
get happy.
<3

get happy.

so i went for a walk with shontel today and say mike and was like DUDE, then we saw moni and maria and jesse and megan getting off the bus and were like DUDE. then.. i went somewhere to watch the oc. and it was fun.
wooooooooooh!

ps. i know that nalanies parents read this now.. and im starting to think my mum knows it cuz she was like outta nowhere, "whos colin?" 'wut?' "colin." 'oh my friend..' "so you like him?" 'uhh maybe why' "how old is he" '....17.." '17!!??!?! haha.. were gunna have to talk about this.." 'screw you' "what?" 'nothing' click.

ahhahahaa.

ugh i really just feel like shit. shit shit shit. finally i come to get a crush whom i thought i would of had a chance with, then i get called obsessive by ali and nnow im being told i am too young. and i know i am, i am always too young. god its been so long scince anyone has even looked at me like that, and this one has just been another fuckup thanks to me. but hey, what can ya do. how fuckin hard is it to be loved in this world?

humanity is inhumain.

//edit. 
On the 1st and 2nd, April showers bring some romantic fooling around with bath towels (and maybe very little else!) for you and whomever you're sharing shampoo with. What a way to have some good, clean romantic fun! On the 6th and 7th, your job is to not be too critical. ~Yep, sometimes people are just a little bit dumb when it comes to making relationship decisions. Don't give in to your impulse to wash their mouth out with soap, though. Instead, back off and let them muddle through on their own.~ No reason you should sit at home washing your hair while they figure out what the heck it is they want, however: On the 11th, go out to dinner with whoever invites you. You could be in for a surprise! By the end of the month -- the 28th and 29th -- you're back in the romantic equivalent of a bubble bath. Whoever the lucky person who's captured your heart is, they're dousing you with warm, bubbly feelings. There's even a little yellow rubber ducky! 

'horror'scopes are fun. shpecially scince its the 7th today.

ive been cutting alot lately, and thats weird because im happy.. ..slightly.
hm.

im thinking of taking a few highschool courses in the summer so that  i can occupy myself with things other then drugs and alcohol. that way i can get my edjucation up before i get into distance ed. and hopefully i will end up graduating earlier. if i do two extra courses this summer, one or two extra through the year and two more next summer ill kill off a couple and get them over with. im planning on spending grade 9 in highschool, atleast half of it, then after getting into distance ed. then i can start working on my career and open up a peircing/tattoo shop, provided i have enough money for an aprenticeship. and a couple years after that, i will try to get somewhat of a degree in phycology.
oh god, work work work. maybe it will get things like drugs off the brain, and occupy me so i dont have time for them. i really dont want to end up how i see myself ending up. i want to be smart and have a career i love, still have a social life.. but i dont want one more cigarette in my body.
as of today, i hearby quit smokeing.
and, im going to start doing sit-ups, crunches, and pushups before i go to bed every night; im tired of this stomich.
other then that, im head over these goddamn heals again, and in such a good mood because of it.
peace mofos :)

i really just cant stop thinking about colin.
..yup.

drugs, rock n roll. bad-ass vegas hoes, late night booty calls. shiny disco balls.

okay. ive had it.
no more writing in this thing, for now. until i come down and think things out.
please, i need you guys to help me. i dont want to be here i dont want to be here.
pelase just fucking burn in hell.
why am i crying?
i dont want you here i dont want me here.
oh my god die please die.
i want to die so badly.
just to get away.
lets move. and never talk to you people again.
i dont want to talk to you ever again.
by the way, see you saturday you dumb cunt.

oh whatever.
im really fucking feeling bad. stephy hates me, and no matter how i try to fix it my words come out wrong and even while im typing there just wrong. sure ive mad some mistakes in the past but god damnit cant those mistakes dis-continue. it seems like everything i say is wrong and she just proves it to me over and over. every single thing i say is wrong, okay? wrong. your right im wrong, as usual. im a stoopid fuck just like youve been telling me.  just watch. youll tell me this is wrong also.

-----------------------------------------

to janelle, i am very fucking sorry. i never ment to hurt you even if i did and i take everything ive ever sayd bad or mean to you back, i love you like a sister. my  best friend, my only comfert zone. you are beautiful even if you dont think you are you are the prettiest person ive ever seen, on the outside and the inside. you care for people so much and its really taught me a lesson about how to treat people, im working on it i really am. i could learn so many lessons from you in five minutes, and you always give the best advice. youve helped me more then ive ever helped you and im sorry.

-----------------------------------------

anyone want to know my few days of hell.
probably not, but ill tell you anyways. me and lanie go to the mall one day but first were at our house. she takes a pack of smokes without me noticing and we leave to catch the bus. a while later she told me she took them and i got upset, "nalanie no, dont fuckin take them you know how much shit id be in if she caught me!?" and she did. nalanie got caught smokeing them and her dad phoned my mum. sooner or later i realize im at nalanies house by force infront of her parents crying. i balled my face off two days straight out of boredom. i also played with alot of raw noodles. i was grounded until i cried so my mum felt bad for me. ahahaha. but i felt bad because i cried my hardest when i couldnt go to marias. my head hurt after that haha. anyways.. i got an ipod today. :) and now im not grounded. Score.
and no, i dont want yer sympathy. kthanks.

Getting further and further in this mess which was enhanced by things along the way only to end up right where she started. beautiful and simple .plain old alice."

fuck you.
kay thanks.

downward twist into lies and under exaggeration,
a vile addiction to cuteness.
a faital attraction to ugly.
come'on gurly, we know excactly what goes on,
under that smile.
and it just twists,
and clumps together,
and kills us all.

so, last night i had a dream. let me explain.
ali had killed herself. we all got reeeally upset and stayd at their house to comfort the family and whatnot. and colin came. eventually colin and i went for a walk in the rain outside crying, and i kissd him. he kissed me back, ect. we went for a swim, in our underwear cuz we didnt have any swimsuits. alone.
kissed and stuff. at a point he was up against the wall and i was ontop of him and blah blah. then the scenery changed into alis basement where we had sex o.O
hhaha. wish.
fun dream, aside from the ali dieing part.
